task.title: How to apply for an internship for college credit
task.shortdesc: Apply for an internship to receive college credit

ul.li: The internship should involve significant time writing in a professional setting.
You should be supervised by someone on-site who can teach you relevant professional skills and is willing to provide a progress report and final evaluation.

context.p: To receive college credit for an internship, you will need to complete the following steps:

step.cmd: Find an internship that meets the aforementioned requirements.
Submit the completed Request form to Dr. Evia, the internship coordinator.
Submit the Student-Employer Agreement form by the first day of Summer Session I.
